post.text: As Secretary of State, Hillary Clinton abused her power to get millions of dollars for the Clinton Foundation, and in return, granted so many favors to the establishment and elites. SO unbelievably corrupt. The system is rigged and as President, I promise you, I will end it! You will always be FIRSTâ€”not donors, not special interests, not Washington insidersâ€”you! #AmericaFirst!

comment.author: Aaron
comment.text: Haha you are losing and look ridiculous hahahahaha... still no plans just words, not even good words... hey Trump... YOU'RE FIRED.

replies.author: Hunter
replies.text: So your supporting the corrupt establishment. ....come on America where's your fight!!!!

replies.author: Aaron
replies.text: Erica that's hilarious having a Trump supporter tell me to educate myself!! haha let's see I've got a Bachelor's degree and a Master's degree - in International Business from the top-ranked program in the US by the way - graduated top of my class, and had to pay for every penny of it myself while working full time as I grew up in a blue collar family in a region in the US that had lost a lot of manufacturing jobs. And guess what? They were going with or without NAFTA, and not Trump or anyone else can bring them back. I also gave myself an informal education on the world by working hard to send myself to 40+ countries across 5 continents solo, so my ideas on other countries and our place among them doesn't just come from my home town views, limited life experience and what I hear on TV. How about you? Love to hear about your education.
